title: HOUR 1 - USC, 49ers, Brian Kelly
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - USC, 49ers, Brian Kelly
description:
In this hour of The Herd, Colin likens USC head football coach Lincoln Riley's debut game to that of another prominent football coach in Los Angeles. Colin sees a wholesale change in how the Trojans performed last Saturday. Also, how patient will San Francisco 49ers head coach Kyle Shanahan be with quarterback Trey Lance now that veteran quarterback Jimmy Garoppolo has been retained for another year? Plus, demanding fans at blue chip programs like LSU have collective amnesia, according to Colin. Even the best coaches, like Brian Kelly, usually struggle in their first year at a program.  Finally, Jeff Howe of The Athletic stops in to discuss pertinent NFL storylines. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
